text:
Webflow - http://jobs.webflow.com - SF, CA | Full-time only

We're looking for serious front-end and backend javascript engineers to build the next generation web authoring tool for professionals. Come join our growing team right in the heart of SOMA, SF. We're still small (~20), so your presence/impact will be felt.

Tech: React.js / Flux / Immutable.js

Backend Tech: node.js / mongodb / redis / chef / nginx / lua / AWS

Reach out directly to: jobs@webflow.com and we'll set up a time to talk!
